column4: hi all... i have a notebbok sony vaio with intel core 2 duo processor... so i want to install ubuntu on it... what version must i to install ????
you can install what ever version you want
your choice, 32 is easier for the average user
some are 32 bit some are 64 bit
don't ask the same question multiple times
just use the 32bit version - you'll have no reason to use 64bit
look at your cpu model number or speak to the manufacturer
you have no reason to use 64bit
you will get NO benifit from it
it doesn't matter why - just use 32bit - it will offer you no performance increase
